items.title: Signal issue near San Bruno causing system-wide delays
items.summary: A signal fault near San Bruno is forcing trains to move at reduced speeds through the affected corridor.

updates.message: Reports received of trains holding between Millbrae and San Bruno.
Operations teams confirmed a signal issue and initiated manual dispatch procedures.
Delays are currently averaging 10-20 minutes in both directions.
